segments.text: I notice the adult woman in the kitchen, absorbed in her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, holding a plate close to her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cascading down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, but acts like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, there are stacks of clean dishes waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on a stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, maybe to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm up, palm open eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so serene and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware the woman is of all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing the water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
